introduction_data.name: Sachin Kr. Shukla
introduction_data.profession: Entrepreneur | Full Stack Web Dev. | UI/UX Designer

about_me: In second year of my college I started working my first startup Gangs Of Hackspur. While building up the product I learned Full stack Web Dev, SEO and Web analytics.
From then, I have learned UI/UX Designing, Data Science and currently working in ML and AI environment. Improving day-by-day just to became an skilled Entrepreneur.
In my free time I love reading business, design and self-improvement books that help me shape my life. Watching movies or brainstorming the solution to problems I had recently.

gangs_of_hackspur.name: Gangs Of Hackspur
about: Why I Founded: The academic content we were getting was very uncertain about why we were learning that course. Without a cause it was just a grade-oriented useless education
Gangs Of Hackspur was a one-stop solution for engineering academic content that I was selling in printed 'Hacks'
I invested 1k INR and sold around 2k. As I was working alone on it and also had academic pressure so I'd to drop it :(

vire_go.name: Vire Go
about: Why We Founded: The B2B marketplace is still offering services and expanding conventionally. We thought we can do it better by offering management to small businesses.
We offer managment and expansion solution to small business in Vellore and Lucknow region.
We founded in December, 2019 and 200+ businesses have joined so far.
